policies.involuntary_refund:
Refunds are processed in accordance with Air Mauritius’ fare rules:

• **Involuntary Refunds:** If Air Mauritius cancels a flight, fails to operate as scheduled, misses a connection, or bans carriage:
  - If no portion is used, a full refund including taxes/fees is allowed.
  - If partially used, the refund is the difference between paid and used fare.
policies.involuntary_reissue:
Rebooking for involuntary schedule changes, long-haul misconnects, or issued tickets includes:

• Option 1: Rebook same day, same airline, same RBD or lowest available fare, same cabin.
• Option 2: Rebook next day, same conditions.

• MANDATORY: Enter both canceled and rebooked flight details in the ENDO box to avoid ADMs.

For missed flights or voluntary date changes:
• Passenger must contact their Travel Agency (TA); MK does not handle direct passenger changes.
• TAs must contact their respective GSA.
• <14 days before departure: MK handles if same-day travel not possible.
policies.voluntary_refund:
- If no portion is used: Full refund minus service/cancellation fees.
  - If partially used: Refund of unused fare portion minus service/cancellation fees.

• **Other Provisions:**
  - Refund only to person named on ticket or who paid for it.
  - Ticket and unused flight coupons must be surrendered.
  - Refunds after ticket expiry may be denied.
  - Refunds may be denied if ticket was shown as proof of departure from a country unless alternate proof is provided.
  - Refunds are made in the original form and currency of payment.
  - All refunds must be processed via authorized agents or Air Mauritius only.

• **24-Hour Cancellation:** Tickets canceled within 24 hours of booking are fully refundable.
policies.medical_refund:
Waiver handling is internal to Air Mauritius.

• No general waiver codes are published.
• All refunds or reissues due to cancellations/changes must be submitted by the Travel Agency to MK.
• Unauthorized refunds will be auto-rejected.
policies.name_change:
Corrections allowed for:
• Spelling/typing errors
• Maiden vs. married name (with proof)
• Inverted surname/first name

**Procedure:**
1. Rebook in same cabin and RBD (or lowest available).
2. Reissue under corrected name.
3. Collect any fare difference (ADC).
4. Apply $25 Name Change Fee.

**Restrictions:**
• No passenger substitution.
• EMDs not permitted for name changes.
• Not allowed on codeshares (e.g., MK/EK, MK/AF) due to KK confirmation limits.
policies.group_booking:
• A group booking requires a minimum of 10 adults on the same flight.
• Benefits include:
  - Preferential group fares
  - Dedicated sales support
  - Name changes permitted before ticket issuance
  - Meal requests allowed (≥48 hours prior to departure)
• Children and infants are not counted in the group minimum.
policies.infant_policy:
• Baby cots are available on international flights for infants under 12 months, ≤11 kg, and ≤74 cm. Request at booking; confirmed at check-in.
• Cots must be stowed during takeoff/landing or turbulence.
• Infant seat belts are provided for lap infants.
• In-flight leg rests/bed extensions allowed on select flights (not in exit, aisle, or middle seats).
• Children under 2 must be secured when seatbelt sign is on.
• Infant CRDs (car seats, torso supports) must meet international aviation standards.
  - Not permitted on domestic/Réunion/Business class segments.
  - CRDs must be approved and declared at booking.
  - CRDs not meeting standards may be checked in.
policies.baggage_policy:
• Free baggage allowance is stated on ticket/itinerary and depends on fare class.
• Excess baggage subject to acceptance and additional fees.

**Prohibited in Checked Baggage:**
- Fragile/perishable items, valuables, electronics, passports, and business docs.
- Dangerous goods (per IATA/ICAO regs).
- Weapons (accepted only as checked baggage with proper declaration, 48+ hrs notice).

**Checked Baggage:**
- Must be labeled with passenger name.
- Weight limit: ≤32kg per piece.
- If delayed or carried on another flight, MK delivers unless law requires presence.

**Unchecked Baggage:**
- Must fit under seat or overhead bin.
- Oversized items (e.g., musical instruments) require advance approval.

**Claim Timelines:**
- Baggage damage: written claim within 7 days.
- Legal action: within 2 years of arrival/missed arrival.

**Animals:**
- Accepted with health/vaccination papers; crate required.
- Not part of free baggage allowance.
- Guide dogs travel free.
- MK not liable for illness, loss, or death unless grossly negligent.
policies.seat_request_policy:
Air Mauritius honors seat reservations where possible but may reassign for operational, medical, or safety reasons. Refunds will be given if a paid seat cannot be honored.

• Special assistance seats are coordinated through reservation agents.
• CRDs and child accessories must be used per guidelines.
• No seat assignment in exit rows for infants or special equipment.
• Seat changes may occur even after boarding.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
Tickets canceled within 24 hours of booking are eligible for full refund without penalty.
Other voids or cancellations must follow fare rules.

involuntary_reissue_code: INV REISSUE MK # of the canceled flight + the # of the new flight.
Cancelled + new rebooked flights must be listed in ENDO (no fixed format)

support_contacts._note: For internal use only. Do not include in autoresponse emails.
